smg.text: Temperature falling significantly. Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Light rain at first. Force 4 to 6 northerly winds with gusts.
Dry. Mainly cloudy. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 2 to 3 northeasterly winds.
Fine, becoming cloudy. A few rain patches later. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. A few rain patches at first. Force 2 to 3 northeasterly winds.
